title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Getty Images

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: PlayStation 4 games for $4.95 at eBay, Catch's $2 stocking-filler sale, get Home Workouts Gym Pro on Android for free and more!

1. Catch stocking fillers: Catch is throwing a 'stocking filler' sale across all product categories. Prices start at just $2 with nothing over $15. Click here!

2. 60% off tech: Catch is also having a big tech clearance sale with up to 60% off select items. There are over 950 products on special! Click here.

3. Cheap video games: eBay is having a limited-time sale on video games and related accessories with everything priced under $50. This includes PlayStation 4 games for $4.95! Click here.

4. 40% off MSI gaming laptops: Amazon is selling a range of MSI enthusiast laptops for a massive 40% off. Click here to see the range!

5. Free Android fitness app (RRP: $2.99): The Google Play Store is giving away the premium, ad-free version of Home Workouts Gym Pro. The app provides daily workout routines for all the main muscle groups with an emphasis on building muscle. Click here!

6. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. You can also get one month free when you use the discount code 'SLNBN'. Here are the details!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: PlayStation 4 games for $4.95 at eBay, Catch's $2 stocking-filler sale, get Home Workouts Gym Pro on Android for free and more!...
